text: __NOTOC__ Guthheard (or Guðheard) was a medieval Bishop of Selsey. Guthheard's only certain date is 845, when he witnessed a grant by Werenberht to Werheard.Anglo-Saxons.net Charters S1194 accessed on 25 August 2007 Guthheard may also have witnessed a charter from 860 that was subsequently altered.Anglo-Saxons.net Charters S327 accessed on 25 August 2007 Guthheard died after the time period of 860 to 863, and sometime before 900.Fryde, et al. Handbook of British Chronology p. 221 ==Citations== ==References== * ==Further reading== * * ==External links== * Category:Bishops of Selsey Category:9th-century bishops
title: Guthheard
